original_text: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe you, O ye of little faith?
korean_text: 오늘 있다가 내일 아궁이에 던져지는 들풀도 하나님이 이렇게 입히시거든 하물며 너희일까보냐 믿음이 작은 자들아

sentences.original_text: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로, 만약 하나님이 이처럼 밭의 풀을 입히시면,

sentences.original_text: and to morrow is cast into the oven,
shall he not much more clothe you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 더욱 잘 입히시지 않겠느냐?
